    Calculating contribution to annual rate ONS Shopping Price Tool data

    Function reference

    Acquire data

    Download raw data files for mm23 shopping price data

    acquire_mm23()
    Download a raw mm23.csv file
    acquire_prices()
    Download ONS shopping price dataset

    Extract mm23 data

    Get mm23 data types and metadata from an mm23 raw data file

    get_mm23_metadata()
    Creates mm23 metadata
    get_mm23_month()
    Get monthly mm23 data
    get_mm23_quarter()
    Get quarterly mm23 data
    get_mm23_year()
    Get yearly mm23 data

    Extract prices data

    Get shopping price data and metadata from a data dowload file

    get_price_data()
    Get average price data from the ONS Shopping Price tool
    get_price_metadata()
    Get average price metadata from the ONS Shopping Price tool

    Get CPI weights data

    Get weights data

    get_cpi_weights()
    Create a CPI weights dataset
    get_cpih_cdid_lookup()
    Get a reference table of CPIH CDIDs
    get_cpih_weights()
    Create a CPIH weights dataset

    Contribution calculation

    Helpers for calcluatiing index contribution to 12 month rate

    unchain()
    Unchains a CPI series
    contribution()
    Calculate contribution of a series to 'all items' 12 month rate

    URLs

    Reference urls

    mm23_url()
    Default url for the current mm23 dataset
    prices_url()
    Default url for the CPI average prices spreadsheet
    reftables_url()
    Default url for the CPI reference tables spreadsheet
